bibl.title: Coptic Sculpture Techniques - A Study of the Manufacturing Traces of Some Coptic Reliefs in the Collection of the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden in Leiden.
bibl.note: A selection of 9 reliefs as a starting-point for a reconstruction of the generally used process of manufacturing (4th-7th century).
bibl.seg: JONGSTE Peter and Mat IMMERZEEL, Coptic Sculpture Techniques - A Study of the Manufacturing Traces of Some Coptic Reliefs in the Collection of the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden in Leiden.
